high_descs: Turn right and walk across the room to the dresser by the bed
Pick up the keys from the dresser
Move left to the lamp on the same dresser
anns.task_desc: Examine the keys under the light of the table lamp

high_descs: Turn right and go to the dresser at the far right corner by the end of the bed.
Take the keys between the lamp and the phone on the dresser.
Go to the left of the dresser.
Turn on the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Inspect keys near a lit lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and walk across the room, then turn right and walk towards the desk, and then turn right again and walk towards the dresser.
Pick up the keys on the dresser.
Turn left and walk towards the door, then turn right towards the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Take the keys on the dresser and turn on the lamp on the dresser.
